channel.title: * Need some help please! *
channel.description:
1. How do I make it you theif from a chest with respawning time. LIKE DODIAN 2. How do I make it you thif from a cage LIKE DODIAN 3. How do I make a dungeon where you need a key to get it

Help. Pl0x

item.title: * Need some help please! *
item.dc:creator: @God_Tricky God Tricky
item.description:
@God_Tricky wrote:

  1. How do I make it you theif from a chest with respawning time. LIKE DODIAN
    Case Editing, spawn the object then add a replace Case line with a locked chest

  2. How do I make it you thif from a cage LIKE DODIAN
    Case editing, add a thiev timer to the cage + a random item command and Xp reward

  3. How do I make a dungeon where you need a key to get it
    Find a good area, Spawn fences around it, spawn a gate and (yet again) cose the case so you need a key
    but dont put in a delete object because nooby coders dont know how to make it so you can get out with out a key

Read full topic
